input.sentences: this is the beginning of the parade and a good time it is . waving to all the people can get tiresome .
this was the month of march so i had good reason to wear green .
now is the time to eat and play . the best cotton candy here .
there is always a lady in red at every parade .
kids are the best reason to be in a parade | it is great to see them smile .
output.sentences: Being in a parade can be very tiresome from all the waving.
I had to wear a green costume because it was the May parade and I was the emerald.
It wasn't all work, though, we were given plenty of time to play and eat.
The red parade lady had the hardest job because she was the one who threw all the beads and candy.
Even though its a lot of work, the reason I would do it again would be to make people smile.
